deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 5 hrs 10 mins.
features: INTIMATE + BODY WASH. This pH balanced wash is safe for intimate skin and great all over. Luxurious, lather gently lifts away impurities while replenishing vital lipids for soft, nourished skin.

MAINTAINS YOUR SKIN'S NATURAL BALANCE - This wash helps maintain the natural balance of your skin by restoring its pH level and helping to keep it healthy and balanced. It also helps reduce the risk of irritation caused by other issues that can build up in intimate areas over time.

SAY GOODBYE TO ODOR - Our yoni wash helps keep you feeling fresh all day long without any harsh chemicals. It's paraben-free, and cruelty-free so you can trust that you're using the best ingredients for your body.

SIMPLE INGREDIENTS - We use simple ingredients like calendula and mint in our formula to help nourish your skin while cleansing away dirt and oils without stripping away essential moisture from the surface of your skin.
NO ANIMAL TESTING - Quality Seamoss and Yoni Oil products are never tested on animals because we believe in cruelty-free beauty products that are safe for everyone! FEEL GOOD ABOUT WHAT YOU USE

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yoni Oil Rose Oil Shower Gel Yoni Steam Usage Areas Intimate Regions Skin, Face, Body, Hair, Hands and Nails Intimate Regions. Whole Body. Avoid Use around Eyes Self-care: Intimate Regions and Facial Steam Directions 1-2 times daily, use after shower/bath Apply to face, body, hair, nails or skin once daily 1. Use in the shower, pump a generous amount onto your clean hand or a wet washcloth. 2. Cleanse intimate areas and skin with warm soapy water. 3. Rinse completely and dry with a soft towel. 2-3 Times a Week. Best to steam at least 3 days before or after menstrual cycle, never during. Remember to stay hydrated and remove any piercings that may come into contact with steam to avoid burns. Scent Mix of Lavender, Lemongrass, Mint, Rose, Rosemary, Chamomile Rose/Floral Yoni Shower Gel: Berries/Mint Yoni Oil: Mix of Lavender, Lemongrass, Mint, Rose, Rosemary, Chamomile Mix of Lavender, Lemongrass, Mint, Rose, Rosemary, Chamomile Eliminates Odor ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Maintain pH Levels ✓ ✓ ✓ Soothes and Rejuvinates Skin ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Eases Discomfort, irritation and itchiness ✓ ✓ ✓ Moisturizes Skin ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Vitamin E ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rose Oil makes my face feel and smell so good
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE the Rose Oil and I’m ready to purchase my second bottle. Also the maker of this oil is so sweet and I would recommend anyone looking to try rose oil to buy this one. It is the Best!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Freshness all day!
reviews.reviewText: The Yoni oil has a nice cooling sensation. Great natural yoni product for women if you are looking for an additional enhancement after shower. The lemongrass fragrance is not too overpowering, but for a natural product that doesn’t throw off my ph, I can deal! I will definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes me smell fresh down their

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice oil, strong scent
reviews.reviewText: Good oil for skin and hair, but has a super sweet/strong scent. It smells nothing like rose, but more like an artificially scented candle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Rose and Yoni Oil
reviews.reviewText: Believe it or not, I cannot stand the smell of roses, but this oil has a sweet , mellow and intoxicating scent. I was skeptical but when I got this dry oil it was mesmerizing! The Yoni oil is also spectacular and offers a little tingle when you put it on, but quickly dissipates. The yoni oil keeps that yoni fresh and clean. I actually mix the yoni oil and rose oil for that absolutely refreshing yoni moment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice oil, better without the bits
reviews.reviewText: I bought this oil as a facial oil. I have only 2 issues. It was delivered on Dec 4, 2023 and the best by date is December 31, 2023. That leads me to believe it is not the freshest batch. (If the manufacturer is reading this- shame on you for sending me nearly expired product).My second issue is the pretty flower bits in the oil. Very decorative, but not good if you are applying directly to the skin- they are sharp and abrasive.The oil itself is light, absorbs well and has a lighter, more floral scent than I thought it would. I thought it would be more overwhelming rose.I will keep it, use it, and beware of the scratchy bits.If the manufacturer wants to send me a fresher bottle, feel free to do so. I almost returned this one because of the batch date.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would recommend
reviews.reviewText: rose oil with roses in it.. It smells very nice but I haven't tested its longevity yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you fresh
reviews.reviewText: I love this yoni oil. I use it everyday after the shower and it keeps me balanced down there. No bv since I’ve started using it.
